title: Behind the scenes: How I film and create typing chat bubble effect in videos

media:group.media:title: Behind the scenes: How I film and create typing chat bubble effect in videos
media:group.media:description:
Thanks so much for 100k subscribers!!
▶ Check out my product: Inkdrop - Markdown note-taking app
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-qBavwqc_mY
▶ My chat bubble tool
https://github.com/craftzdog/chat-bubbles-for-yt

https://github.com/craftzdog/dotfiles-public
▶ My NeoVim set up
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FW2X1CXrU1w
▶ My equipment
* Video editing: Final Cut Pro X
* Camera: Fujifilm X-T4 - https://amzn.to/3MVuPBV
* Tripod: Gitzo GK1545T-82TQD - https://amzn.to/3LTNIEZ
* Mic: Zoom H1n - https://amzn.to/38VAwkx
* Slider: SliderONE v2 - https://amzn.to/3Fo8eLK
* Keyboard: Keychron Q1 with Gateron Zealios V2 67g
* Browser: Min - https://minbrowser.org/
* Screen recorder: CleanShot X - https://cleanshot.com/

Follow me online here:
